sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO br_intro_info ( BU_CATE , BU_NOTICE , BU_PJ_NAME , BU_PJ_DE_NOTICE , BU_PJ_SERVICE , BU_STEP_ONE_ST , BU_STEP_ONE_ED , BU_STEP_TWO_ST , BU_STEP_TWO_ED , BU_STEP_THR_ST , BU_STEP_THR_ED , BU_DEV_ALL_ST , BU_DEV_ALL_ED , BU_SEC_GRADE , BU_OBJ_SUM_ED , BU_STEP_ONE_SUM , BU_STEP_TWO_SUM , BU_STEP_THR_SUM , BU_KEYWORD_KOR , BU_KEYWORD_KOR2 , BU_KEYWORD_KOR3 , BU_KEYWORD_KOR4 , BU_KEYWORD_KOR5 , BU_KEYWORD_ENG , BU_KEYWORD_ENG2 , BU_KEYWORD_ENG3 , BU_KEYWORD_ENG4 , BU_KEYWORD_ENG5 , BU_TEC_STA_GRO , BU_TEC_STA_GRO2 , BU_TEC_STA_GRO3 , BU_APP , BU_6T_GRO , BU_6T_GRO2 , BU_6T_GRO3 , BU_10M_TECH , BU_NAT_SCI_TEC_GRO , BU_NAT_SCI_TEC_GRO2 , BU_NAT_SCI_TEC_GRO3 , BU_NAT_EMP_TEC_GRO , BU_NAT_EMP_TEC_GRO2 , BU_NAT_EMP_TEC_GRO3 , BU_TEC_MAP_STR_GRO , BU_TEC_MAP_STR_GRO2 , BU_TEC_MAP_STR_GRO3 , BU_KOR_STA_IND_GRO , BU_KOR_STA_IND_GRO2 , BU_KOR_STA_IND_GRO3 , BU_KOR_STA_IND_GRO4 , BU_KOR_STA_IND_GRO5 ) VALUES ( #buCate# , #buNotice# , #buPjName# , #buPjDeNotice# , #buPjService# , #buStepOneSt# , #buStepOneEd# , #buStepTwoSt# , #buStepTwoEd# , #buStepThrSt# , #buStepThrEd# , #buDevAllSt# , #buDevAllEd# , #buSecGrade# , #buObjSumEd# , #buStepOneSum# , #buStepTwoSum# , #buStepThrSum# , #buKeywordKor# , #buKeywordKor2# , #buKeywordKor3# , #buKeywordKor4# , #buKeywordKor5# , #buKeywordEng# , #buKeywordEng2# , #buKeywordEng3# , #buKeywordEng4# , #buKeywordEng5# , #buTecStaGro# , #buTecStaGro2# , #buTecStaGro3# , #buApp# , #bu6tGro# , #bu6tGro2# , #bu6tGro3# , #bu10MTech# , #buNatSciTecGro# , #buNatSciTecGro2# , #buNatSciTecGro3# , #buNatEmpTecGro# , #buNatEmpTecGro2# , #buNatEmpTecGro3# , #buTecMapStrGro# , #buTecMapStrGro2# , #buTecMapStrGro3# , #buKorStaIndGro# , #buKorStaIndGro2# , #buKorStaIndGro3# , #buKorStaIndGro4# , #buKorStaIndGro5# )

INSERT INTO br_company_code ( CO_PK , BU_AGN_ID , BU_ORG_NAME , BU_COM_REG_NUM , BU_COR_REG_NUM , BU_REP , WRITE_TIME ) VALUES ( #coPk# , #buAgnId# , #buOrgName# , #buComRegNum# , #buCorRegNum# , #buRep# , now() )

INSERT INTO br_company_work ( CO_PK , BU_ASS_TYPE , BU_BUS_NAME , BU_PRO_TIT , BU_FIN_GOAL_COR_CON , BU_PAR_ST_DAT , BU_PAR_ED_DAT , BU_BUS_EXP , BU_RES_ROL , BU_TAS_STA , BU_AGN_ID ) VALUES ( #coPk# , #buAssType# , #buBusName# , #buProTit# , #buFinGoalCorCon# , #buParStDat# , #buParEdDat# , #buBusExp# , #buResRol# , #buTasSta# , #buAgnId# )
INSERT INTO br_pj_work_mapping ( LE_PK , BU_NUM ) VALUES ( #lePk# , #buNum# )

INSERT INTO br_company_member ( CO_PK , BU_NUM , MA_GUBUN , BU_NAME , BU_DATE_BIR , BU_PHO_NUM , BU_EM_ADD , BU_EM_ADD2 , BU_FAX_NUM , BU_MOB_PHO_NUM , BU_MOB_PHO_NUM2 , BU_MOB_PHO_NUM3 , BU_DUR_WOR_SAME_IND , BU_REP_ABL ) VALUES ( #coPk# , #buNum# , #maGubun# , #buName# , #buDateBir# , #buPhoNum# , #buEmAdd# , #buEmAdd2# , #buFaxNum# , #buMobPhoNum# , #buMobPhoNum2# , #buMobPhoNum3# , #buDurWorSameInd# , #buRepAbl# )

INSERT INTO br_company_member2 ( CO_PK , BU_NUM , BU_ORG_NAME , BU_RES_OR_NOT , BU_NAME , BU_DATE_BIR , BU_DATE_ENT , BU_SPOT , BU_TOT_ANN_SAL , BU_FIN_DEG , BU_HOL_CER , BU_PAT_NAT_RD_PRO , BU_PAT_RATE_PRO ) VALUES ( #coPk# , #buNum# , #buOrgName# , #buResOrNot# , #buName5# , #buDateBir5# , #buDateEnt# , #buSpot# , #buTotAnnSal# , #buFinDeg# , #buHolCer# , #buPatNatRdPro# , #buPatRatePro# )

INSERT INTO br_company_member3 ( CO_PK , BU_AFF_TYPE , BU_ORG_NAME , BU_FIN_DEG , BU_NEW_HIR , BU_YON_MAN , BU_TOT_ANN_SAL , BU_PAT_RATE_PRO2 ) VALUES ( #coPk# , #buAffType# , #buOrgName# , #buFinDeg# , #buNewHir# , #buYonMan# , #buTotAnnSal# , #buPatRatePro2# )

INSERT INTO br_work_plan ( CO_PK , BU_TEC_ROD_CLA_ONE , BU_TEC_ROD_CLA_TWO , BU_TEC_ROD_CLA_THR , BU_ASS_REL_SRL_ROA , BU_SEL_ROA_CON_TEC , BU_ROU_PATH , BU_ROU_PATH2 ) VALUES ( #coPk# , #buTecRodClaOne# , #buTecRodClaTwo# , #buTecRodClaThr# , #buAssRelSrlRoa# , #buSelRoaConTec# , #buRouPath# , #buRouPath2# )

INSERT INTO br_com_info_manage ( CO_PK , BU_AGN_ID , BU_PW , BU_PW_CON , BU_ACC_MAN_NAME , BU_EM_ADD , BU_MOB_PHO_NUM , BU_COM_REG_NUM , BU_COR_REG_NUM , BU_ORG_NAME , BU_COR_TYPE , BU_DATE_EST , BU_IND_CLA , BU_MAIN_PRO , BU_HOME_PAGE , BU_HEA_ADD , BU_MAIN_BUS_ADD , BU_HEA_AREA , BU_MAIN_BUS_AREA , BU_HEA_OFF_DEP , BU_HEA_OFF_MON_RENT , BU_MAIN_BUS_DEP , BU_MAIN_BUS_MON_RENT , BU_NUM_FT_WOR , BU_NUM_OFF_WOR , BU_NUM_LAB_WOR , BU_NUM_SKI_WOR , BU_NUM_TEC_WOR , BU_OTHER , BU_NAME , BU_DATE_BIR , BU_PHO_NUM , BU_EM_ADD2 , BU_FAX_NUM , BU_MOB_PHO_NUM2 , BU_BASE_FIS_YEAR , BU_EAPORTS , BU_EAPORTS2 , BU_TOT_DEBT , BU_OPE_PRO , BU_CUR_ASS , BU_TOT_EQU , BU_RnD_INV , BU_CUR_LSA , BU_TOT_ASS , BU_IVN , BU_CUR_FIX_ASS , BU_NET_INC , BU_CUR_SAL , BU_RLE_SAL , BU_COM_DES_NUM , BU_COM_VAL_PER , BU_VEN_COM_DES_NUM , BU_VEN_COM_VAL_PER ) VALUES ( #coPk# , #buAgnId# , #buPw# , #buPwCon# , #buAccManName# , #buEmAdd# , #buMobPhoNum# , #buComRegNum# , #buCorRegNum# , #buOrgName# , #buCorType# , #buDateEst# , #buIndCla# , #buMainPro# , #buHomePage# , #buHeaAdd# , #buMainBusAdd# , #buHeaArea# , #buMainBusArea# , #buHeaOffDep# , #buHeaOffMonRent# , #buMainBusDep# , #buMainBusMonRent# , #buNumFtWor# , #buNumOffWor# , #buNumLabWor# , #buNumSkiWor# , #buNumTecWor# , #buOther# , #buName# , #buDateBir# , #buPhoNum# , #buEmAdd2# , #buFaxNum# , #buMobPhoNum2# , #buBaseFisYear# , #buEaports# , #buEaports2# , #buTotDebt# , #buOpePro# , #buCurAss# , #buTotInv# , #buRndInv# , #buCurLsa# , #buTotAss# , #buIvn# , #buCurFixAss# , #buNetInc# , #buCurSal# , #buRleSal# , #buComDesNum# , #buComValPer# , #buVenComDesNum# , #buVenComValPer# )

INSERT INTO br_com_fi ( CO_PK , BU_SHA_NAME , BU_REL_MAN , BU_HOL_STO_ORD_STO , BU_HOL_STO_STO , BU_AMO_STO_HEL ) VALUES ( #coPk# , #buShaName# , #buRelMan# , #buHolStoOrdSto# , #buHolStoSto# , #buAmoStoHel# )

INSERT INTO br_com_st_date ( CO_PK , BU_PRO_NAME , BU_PRO_TIT , BU_FIN_GOAL_COR_CON , BU_ASS_STA_DAT , BU_ASS_END_DAT , BU_PAR_STA_DAT , BU_PAR_END_DAT , BU_TOT_GOV_APP , BU_RES_ROLE , BU_INT_GOV_APP , BU_TASK_STA , BU_COM_RES ) VALUES ( #coPk# , #buProName# , #buProTit# , #buFinGoalCorCon# , #buAssStaDat# , #buAssEndDat# , #buParStaDat# , #buParEndDat# , #buTotGovApp# , #buResRole# , #buIntGovApp# , #buTaskSta# , #buComRes# )

INSERT INTO br_com_gn_res ( CO_PK , BU_BUS_NAME , BU_PRO_TIT2 , BU_FIN_GOAL_COR_CON2 , BU_BUS_ST_DATE , BU_BUS_END_DATE , BU_PAR_ST_DATE , BU_PAR_END_DATE , BU_TOT_PRO_COST , BU_RES_ROLE2 , BU_INS_BUS_EXP , BU_BUS_STA , BU_COM_RES2 ) VALUES ( #coPk# , #buBusName# , #buProTit2# , #buFinGoalCorCon2# , #buBusStDate# , #buBusEndDate# , #buParStDate# , #buParEndDate# , #buTotProCost# , #buResRole2# , #buInsBusExp# , #buBusSta# , #buComRes2# )
INSERT INTO br_com_eq ( CO_PK , BU_FAC_EQU_NAME , BU_STANDARD , BU_PUR_PRI , BU_TEAR_PUR , BU_PUR ) VALUES ( #coPk# , #buFacEquName# , #buStandard# , #buPurPri# , #buTearPur# , #buPur# )

INSERT INTO br_com_sal ( CO_PK , BU_COM_ITEM_NAME , BU_COM_YEAR , BU_ITEM_USE , BU_QUA_PRI_COM , BU_EXP_NOT , BU_SAL_CHA ) VALUES ( #coPk# , #buComItemName# , #buComYear# , #buItemUse# , #buQuaPriCom# , #buExpNot# , #buSalCha# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT CO_PK AS coPk ,BU_PJ_NAME AS buPjName FROM br_intro_info WHERE BU_PJ_NAME = #buPjName# ORDER BY CO_PK LIMIT 1
SELECT CO_PK AS coPk ,BU_PJ_NAME AS buPjName FROM br_intro_info WHERE CO_PK = #coPk# ORDER BY CO_PK LIMIT 1

SELECT a.CO_PK AS coPk , a.BU_PJ_NAME AS buPjName , b.BU_AGN_ID AS buAgnId , b.BU_ORG_NAME AS buOrgName FROM br_intro_info a LEFT JOIN br_company_code b ON a.CO_PK = b.CO_PK WHERE b.BU_AGN_ID = '1' AND b.CO_PK = #coPk# ORDER BY b.CO_PK LIMIT 1
SELECT CO_PK AS coPk , TL_PK AS tlPk FROM br_work_plan WHERE CO_PK = #coPk# ORDER BY CO_PK LIMIT 1
